body: Grasshope, You can view the energy balance results in a non-stacked fashion but it's usually not very pretty: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/2FjpMK*bX1YZRDImYp*tB8Lff6yaLXdztC4hnH3nxAyQk-OfiImu9uPzeuJbC3I4D9WAFAFKWFSCfHnkQ1FrZ2QuguXOMGU8/NonStackEBal.JPG) I noticed that your version of the component is old and I updated it a few days ago.  Let me know if you have the same issue in the most recent component. -Chris
